name: Is that Dirt On The Window?
name_original: Is that Dirt On The Window?
description:
This is a mini game made for the Mini Jam 121: Reflections.

Is that dirt on the window, awww, it's moving. Looks like you should clean your windows from time to time because now the dirt has form life as a slime. And your mission as a slime is.... well, to be alive, so now you have to find the tiny drops of water on the window but beware that slimes are not the only ones atract to the party.

Use the reflection of the inner room lights or let the dirt guide to open you a new path to your goal.

Controls:

Move Left-Right

ADJump
SpaceShoot
KLights on/off

L
